title: Rides for Wear (Uber app)
summary: Hail an uber from your wrist!
developerAddress:
The internet
AFK: Calle Timoteo Padros 14, 28200 El Escorial, Madrid, Spain
description: This is an app to order Uber cars from your Android Wear watch. NOTE: This app needs the official Uber app in order to work.THIS IS NOT A STANDALONE APP, IT NEEDS THE OFFICIAL UBER APP FOR AUTHENTICATION!
descriptionHTML:
This is an app to order Uber cars from your Android Wear watch. NOTE: This app needs the official Uber app in order to work.

THIS IS NOT A STANDALONE APP, IT NEEDS THE OFFICIAL UBER APP FOR AUTHENTICATION!
comments: Great idea but... Great idea especially as Uber seems in no hurry to make their app Android wear compatible. However, this crashes with every button I press. Running on a Moto 360 2015.
